type: Tutorial Step - Monitoring the Fun Way!

definition.text: You thought I would let you monitor the Live Trading Session watching the ugly list of orders at the exchange? No way!

paragraphs.text: Superalgos produces the same kind of simulations you fell in love with for live sessions too, in realtime!
Can you see the first few buy orders on the chart?

I just brought you to the present time, on the 1-minute chart. You should be able to see the latest candle forming and a few orders already. The Rate Scale is in automatic mode at both ends. Feel free to change the scales to your liking.
